experience.title: Head Of Business Development and R&D

experience.title: Managing Director
experience.description: Directing strategy towards the profitable growth and operation of the company. ‚Ä¢ Developing strategic operating plans that reflect the longer-term objectives and priorities established by the board. ‚Ä¢ Maintaining an ongoing dialogue with the Chair of the board. ‚Ä¢ Putting in place adequate operational planning and financial control systems. ‚Ä¢ Closely monitoring the operating and financial results against plans and budgets. ‚Ä¢ Taking remedial action where necessary and informing the board of significant changes. ‚Ä¢ Maintaining the operational performance of the company. ‚Ä¢ Building and maintaining an effective executive team.

experience.title: Co-Founder & MD
experience.description: Working On Education System:-My Vision:-To empower students to make lifelong, responsible and meaningful choices in a global and dynamic world.A future in which students discover and develop meaningful career paths that enhance their lives and communities.My Beliefs:‚Ä¢  All children are unique and should be treated with respect and dignity.‚Ä¢  Every student can succeed.‚Ä¢  Learning is a lifelong process.‚Ä¢  Fostering a positive self-image is the collaborative effort of the school, home, and community which     leads to responsible and productive citizenship.‚Ä¢  The diverse needs of all students must be addressed through the school counseling program.‚Ä¢  Every student needs appropriate personal and social skills to achieve optimum benefits from the     educational program.‚Ä¢  A comprehensive, developmental school counseling program is not a support service but an integral     part of the total education program.‚Ä¢  A developmentally appropriate school counseling program provides important benefits to individual     students by addressing their intellectual, emotional, social, physical, and psychological needs.
experience.description_html: Working On Education System:-My Vision:-To empower students to make lifelong, responsible and meaningful choices in a global and dynamic world.A future in which students discover and develop meaningful career paths that enhance their lives and communities.My Beliefs:‚Ä¢ All children are unique and should be treated with respect and dignity.‚Ä¢ Every student can succeed.‚Ä¢ Learning is a lifelong process.‚Ä¢ Fostering a positive self-image is the collaborative effort of the school, home, and community which  leads to responsible and productive citizenship.‚Ä¢ The diverse needs of all students must be addressed through the school counseling program.‚Ä¢ Every student needs appropriate personal and social skills to achieve optimum benefits from the  educational program.‚Ä¢ A comprehensive, developmental school counseling program is not a support service but an integral  part of the total education program.‚Ä¢ A developmentally appropriate school counseling program provides important benefits to individual  students by addressing their intellectual, emotional, social, physical, and psychological needs.

experience.title: Director
experience.description: Responsible for the day-to day running of the business with a particular emphasis on sales and business development. Making sure that the business continues to grow by way of developing new clients while maintaining its existing customer base.‚Ä¢	Initiatives and Dutieso	Worked as an ambassador of the business at all times.o	Monitoring business activity, studying the outcome of projects.o	Generating new business through online prospecting, cold calling, face to face meetings and networkingo	Reviewing existing contracts and looking for growth opportunities.o	Implementing sales and marketing strategies and planso	Writing up sales reports, activity reports and revenue forecasts.o	Plan approaches and pitches. * Work with team to develop proposals that speaks to the client‚Äôs needs, concerns, and objectives.o	Completing all documentation and administrative records, fully and accurately‚Ä¢	AchievementsPlayed key role in company initiatives for developing new projects for future use.o	Successfully implemented and restructured the Idea o	Founder of whizzpick (a sales/customer oriented idea of Banja Hero)o	Increased profits by 30% in a highly competitive environment by focusing on the less price sensitive customer segments who valued service, which eliminated the need to use price as a mechanism for securing new business.o	Reduced the time required to respond to customer requests and improved customer satisfaction by providing front line counter staff with the skills, knowledge authority needed to resolve customer enquiries and complaints.
experience.description_html: Responsible for the day-to day running of the business with a particular emphasis on sales and business development. Making sure that the business continues to grow by way of developing new clients while maintaining its existing customer base.‚Ä¢ Initiatives and Dutieso Worked as an ambassador of the business at all times.o Monitoring business activity, studying the outcome of projects.o Generating new business through online prospecting, cold calling, face to face meetings and networkingo Reviewing existing contracts and looking for growth opportunities.o Implementing sales and marketing strategies and planso Writing up sales reports, activity reports and revenue forecasts.o Plan approaches and pitches. * Work with team to develop proposals that speaks to the client‚Äôs needs, concerns, and objectives.o Completing all documentation and administrative records, fully and accurately‚Ä¢ AchievementsPlayed key role in company initiatives for developing new projects for future use.o Successfully implemented and restructured the Idea o Founder of whizzpick (a sales/customer oriented idea of Banja Hero)o Increased profits by 30% in a highly competitive environment by focusing on the less price sensitive customer segments who valued service, which eliminated the need to use price as a mechanism for securing new business.o Reduced the time required to respond to customer requests and improved customer satisfaction by providing front line counter staff with the skills, knowledge authority needed to resolve customer enquiries and complaints.

recommendations: Priyanka Biswas ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of graduating from IIT Bombay with Ravindra and working alongside him at our first startup job. From the very beginning, it was clear that Ravindra possesses exceptional leadership qualities that set him apart. His entrepreneurial spirit and sharp management skills have consistently been his strongest assets, making him a true force in any business environment. Ravindra's ability to navigate challenges, inspire teams, and drive results is truly commendable. As a founder of multiple companies, he has repeatedly demonstrated his ability to take ideas from concept to execution, while maintaining a clear vision and delivering impressive results. His strategic mindset, combined with his knack for making sound decisions under pressure, ensures that any company would benefit immensely from having him in a leadership role. I highly recommend Ravindra for any organization looking for a visionary leader and an outstanding entrepreneur. He will undoubtedly be an asset to any team he joins.‚Äù

Shreya Ghosh ‚ÄúI had the pleasure of working closely with Ravindra at IPAC. I can confidently say that he is one of the most skilled and dedicated professionals I've had the opportunity to work with. Ravindra‚Äôs expertise in analytics is truly remarkable. He has a keen ability to dissect complex data and extract actionable insights that drive strategic decision-making. His analytical acumen has been a critical asset in optimizing our operations and ensuring we stay ahead of the curve. In field management, Ravindra excels at leading teams with precision and effectiveness. He knows how to motivate his team, ensuring everyone is aligned with the project‚Äôs goals and delivering results. His operational skills are equally impressive‚Äîhe manages processes seamlessly, ensuring everything runs smoothly and efficiently. Ravindra‚Äôs team management skills are second to none. He understands how to bring out the best in his team members, fostering a collaborative environment where everyone feels valued and empowered to contribute. His leadership style is both inspiring and inclusive, making him a natural leader who others look up to. He has a unique ability to connect with stakeholders at all levels, building strong relationships crucial for any project's success. Many of us have learned from his approach to managing these relationships, and his influence has made a lasting impact on our professional development. Ravindra is not just a manager; he is a leader who leads by example. His dedication, strategic thinking, and ability to navigate complex challenges make him an invaluable asset to any team. I highly recommend Ravindra for any leadership role‚Äîhe is a true professional who consistently delivers excellence.‚Äù

projects: [{"title":"A Burglar Alarm Project","start_date":"Jul 2013","end_date":"Nov 2015","description":"Guide: prof Udayan Ganguly, Dept. of Electrical Engineering, IIT BombayÔÇ∑ A burglar alarm which beeps when somebody cross a protected area.ÔÇ∑ Incorporating a circuit element which varies its output across its terminal with variation of intensity of lightÔÇ∑ Using the circuit in two different states(On/Off), LDR(Light dependent resistor), Op Amp, PNP And Resistors"},{"title":"Thermoelectricity: Materials and Applications | Seminar Project","start_date":"Jan 2015","end_date":"Apr 2015","description":"Guide: Prof. Titas Dasgupta, Dept. of Metallurgical Engineering & Material Science, IIT BombayÔÇ∑ Extensive study of the fundamentals of thermoelectricity and its history.ÔÇ∑ Documented a report and briefed a presentation for the project on a brief review on bismuth telluride, a thermoelectric material"},{"title":"Firewood Cook Stove | CTARA, IIT Bombay","start_date":"Jul 2014","end_date":"Nov 2014","description":"Guide: Prof. Shireesh Kedare, Dept. of Energy Science & Engineering, IIT BombayÔÇ∑ Undertook 200 hrs. Study tours near Thane to analyses cook stove, environmental & social aspects of recycling.ÔÇ∑ Surveyed over 4 pada(small villages) and 200 families to understand structure of cook stove and related problems. And come up with a new Cook Stove with good efficiency"},{"title":"Computer Programming and Utilization Project","start_date":"Jul 2012","end_date":"Nov 2012","description":"Guide: Prof Abhiram Ranade, Dept. of Computer Science and Engineering, IIT Bombay‚Ä¢ It is programmed a Snake Game from C++ Programming"}]
